name: Construction Equipment Association
goal: Representative trade association for the construction equipment sector in the United Kingdom. A member of the Committee for European Construction Equipment and recognised by the UK Government.
interests: Climate Action, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Any matters affecting the manufacture, supply and sale of construction equipment. This includes the Machinery Directive, Emissions (Noise and gas and particulate), Outdoor Noise Directive, external trade relations.
